Game.Notes: You are a stressed out, miserable salaryman. One day a lawyer comes to tell you that your only aunt has died. She had a daughter, who had been abused by her from the time she was born. You take it upon yourself to care for this girl, healing both yourself and her in the process.
Game.Title: Fureai ~Kizu Darake no Shoujo o Amayakasu~

Game.Developer: このブランドの公式サイトを開く
Game.Notes:
The plain lands of “Eos” located in west “Serenus.”
Seven fortresses located in the northern boundaries of Eos served as the setting for the war between the Alliance and Legion. This conflict, however, was in its final stages with the decline of the Dark Elf queen’s power. Under the High Elf’s calling, the “Seven Shields Alliance” was formed to stand against the Legion. The Alliance issued a request to the group of mercenaries headed by the protagonist, known as the “Black Dogs.” They were to be the vanguard for an all-out-war in order to put an end to this conflict, but…
Upon invading the Dark Elf queen’s country, the Black Dogs turned that land into their stronghold and began to invade their former allies’ countries. Panic, shock, indignation, sorrow… After the betrayal, the Black Dogs’ leader issued an unbelievable declaration - the founding of the “Cuntry,” where women are obligated to partake in sexual service for all men.
The women of the Alliance would soon learn first-hand that this declaration was neither a lie, nor an exaggeration…
[Edited from [url=http://blog.mangagamer.org/2017/02/24/kuroinu-chapter-1-now-available-for-pre-order/]MangaGamer Blog[/url]]

Game.Notes:
A theocratic empire is trying to unite the continent under its banner. Their next target is a small city-state ruled by the protagonist, an Ether researcher. The Empire sends the Dragon Priestess Milia to subjugate the heretic nation, which has eschewed religion in the name of science. Can the protagonist beat back the superior might of the Empire with clever tactics and Ether-based technologies? Or will he finally meet his end by the blade of his former friend, tasked with silencing his heresy once and for all?
[From the review on [url=http://sanahtlig.blogspot.com/2015/10/review-venus-blood-gaia.html]Sanahtlig's Corner[/url]]

Game.Notes:
[Story]
The heroine Yukino Makihara was born in an ordinary family, and had been raised in an ordinary environment. Now She lives in her uncle's house because of her school's location.
She is a bit clumsy and careless, often gets misfortunes. But she works hard on study despite of such things.
A turning point of her life comes when she has an accidental eye contact with a boy in same school at a library.
His name is Souji. As talking with him a number of times, she is getting attracted by his serious attitude to his dream to be a doctor and bright personality.
After getting in a relationship with him, Yukino sets her mind to go to the university which he wants to go to. But her family isn't affluent enough to let her do so...
Thus, she begins to earn money.
* You can keep her virginity until the end of this game.
[Game Flow]
Yukino takes action after school. There are many ways of spending time: to gather information, to go to work, to have a rest in her house and so forth.
Her job availability is limited depending on her health. When the health runs out, she has to take a day for rest.
* As her sense of guilt decreases, she gets able to do lewder jobs.
[System] - Part-time jobs There is a variety of jobs with different consumption of her health. The amount of the health needed corresponds to the amount of pay.
- Days Each day offers different availability of jobs. In the weekend she can work two times at noon and night.
- Health This value is consumed upon doing jobs. she has to take a day for rest when run out.
- Desire This value increases when sexually harassed or something. Her sense of guilt is decreases in response to increase of this value. So vent off her desire by having H things with Souji.
- Sense Of Guilt This value represents her sense of guilt toward Souji. Some particular sexual harassment and jobs decrease this value. If reached a certain point she gets able to doing prostitution.
- "Detected" Value This value increases when she acts flashy. Something happens if this value rises up...?
- Frustrated A bad status. She can do prostitution with anybody in this condition.
- Dairy Yukino writes her diary every day. This tells what she has done so far.
- Souji's Perspective Yukino's boyfriend Souji's perspective, unlocked on a certain condition.
- Internet BBS A BBS on the Internet seen from Souji's point of view. Peeping photos and sex photos are posted, and later......?
Game.Title: NTRed Class Rep Yukino ~H Days of Class Rep Who Can't Say No~

Game.Notes:
Kazuya was mistreated by his boss, and he was both physically and mentally exhausted. The only one who still helped him was his senpai at the workplace, Miori. He can keep going on because of her support. However before long, he quit the job upon her recommendation.
“It’s fine not to give it your all.”
With those words, it seemed like all the stress disappeared and he could just enjoy a simple life where she would take care of him all day long.
[From [url=https://omochikaeri.wordpress.com/2018/03/15/march-2018-eroge-releases/]Hau~ Omochikaeri~![/url]]
